name: Nateyvania: Paso Doble of Flame
description:
An entry for March 2023's SodorJam! The theme was "Castlevania Clone"

This was my first 2D platformer and physics were wayyyy harder for me to wrap my head around, but I learned a lot! 

GAMEPLAY

Skeletons are everywhere! Break those bones whose sinews give them motion and reach the end of the level!

-You have 3 hits before you lose - I ran out of time to implement a health UI oops

CONTROLS

A, D :   Move Left/Right (keyboard arrows also work)

Spacebar:  Jump

Left Ctrl : Attack

GAMEPAD SUPPORTED:

D-pad :  Move

Bottom button (xbox A):   Jump

Left button (xbox X) : Attack

THANK YOU

Thank you for playing!

Thank you to Brian David Gilbert for creating his Castlevania Game Naming Chart

Thank you to SodorArt for hosting this jam!
